content: I think I'll start by sending a brief introductory email to a few local pet businesses, highlighting the benefits of collaborating with me and mentioning my ability to create engaging content. I'll keep the tone professional and friendly, and attach some examples of my work, including my popular TikTok video of Luna chasing a laser pointer. If they express interest, I can follow up with a phone call or in-person meeting to discuss the details. Thanks for the advice!
